Html:
is it possible to cache google map of a certain city or country without affecting program performance ?

in the demo program there is 22mb cache size limit , is it the demo limit or i'll get the same limitations on my programs ?

can i estimate total size required for caching a defined location with a certain zoom level or i should download this to find out ?

 

and thanks for the great tool !

22MB is default memory cache size for uncompressed raw image data, disk cache limit is 2TB, you don't have to think about background caching it WORKS.

..and about size, well try prefetcher, medium city on all levels can take even few GB
